v8:item.v8:content: Unique ID of the owner form

Settings.QueryText:
SELECT DISTINCT NestedQuery.SerialNumber.Sold AS Sold, NestedQuery.SerialNumber FROM (SELECT SerialNumbersBalance.SerialNumber AS SerialNumber FROM AccumulationRegister.SerialNumbers.Balance( , ProductsAndServices = &ProductsAndServices AND Characteristic = &Characteristic AND Batch = &Batch AND NOT SerialNumber IN (&ListOfSelected) AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnit AND Cell = &Cell) AS SerialNumbersBalance
UNION ALL
SELECT SerialNumbers.SerialNumber FROM AccumulationRegister.SerialNumbers AS SerialNumbers WHERE SerialNumbers.Recorder = &ThisDocument AND NOT SerialNumbers.SerialNumber IN (&ListOfSelected) AND SerialNumbers.SerialNumber.Owner = &ProductsAndServices) AS NestedQuery

v8:item.v8:content: This is the receipt from the customs union
Fill missing quantity of serial numbers
